front.title: Export of Segment Routing Policy Attributes in IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX)

abstract.t: This document defines new IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX) Information Elements (IEs) to export attributes of Segment Routing (SR) and Segment Routing over IPv6 (SRv6) policies applied to IP flows, which enables correlation between observed traffic flows and the SR/SRv6 policies that carry them.
